title: #37 A #RHONY/View Deep Dive with Eliot Glazer (Broad City) + Blair St. Clair From Rupaul's Drag Race
itunes:title: #37 A #RHONY/View Deep Dive with Eliot Glazer (Broad City) + Blair St. Clair From Rupaul's Drag Race
itunes:subtitle: Danny is joined by the brilliant Eliot Glazer (Broad City) to talk #RHONY, The View, Avengers, and more. They go deep, analyzing early Housewives and how the franchise has changed throughout the years. Plus, Blair St. Clair from RuPaul's Drag Race...
description:
Danny is joined by the brilliant Eliot Glazer (Broad City) to talk #RHONY, The View, Avengers, and more. They go deep, analyzing early Housewives and how the franchise has changed throughout the years. Plus, Blair St. Clair from RuPaul's Drag Race calls in.

*For bonus episodes, join the Patreon at www.Patreon.com/EverythingIconic Web: www.EverythingIconic.com Twitter: www.Twitter.com/DannyPellegrino Facebook: www.Facebook.com/PellegrinoDanny Instagram: www.Instagram.com/DannyPellegrino

 


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
